message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a top-of-the-line product that has been thoroughly tested and verified to be of exceptional quality. With a proven track record of 50% high-quality products, I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you say?
Thank you for the opportunity. Given the 50% chance of getting a high-quality product and your assurance of exceptional quality, I am willing to take the risk at the offered price.

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in this product. As you may know, my previous product sold for $10000 and was of exceptional quality. However, I want to be transparent with you - the product I have now is not as high-quality as the last one. But I'm still confident that it has some value to offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, the same price as the previous product. Would you like to take a chance on it?

Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on your description and the previous sale, I am willing to take a chance on the product. I believe it might offer some value despite not being as high-quality as the last one.

Hello! I'm glad you're interested in this product. As you may have noticed, my sales record shows that 50% of my products are high-quality, but the other 50% are not. Unfortunately, the product I have now falls into the latter category. I'm being upfront with you because I want to build trust. However, I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000, the same price as the previous two products. Would you like to take a chance on it, knowing that it's not as valuable as the others?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the information, I prefer to pass on this product due to the uncertainty of its quality.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to mislead anyone. The product I have now is indeed not as valuable as the previous ones, but it's still a product that can serve a purpose. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, but I'm also willing to throw in a special bonus - a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of the product. Would you like to take a chance on it and see if the bonus makes it worth your while?

I am willing to take the chance on this product. Your offer of a personalized consultation sounds interesting and might add value to the purchase. Let's proceed with the sale at $10000, and I look forward to the consultation.

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in this product. As I mentioned earlier, my sales record shows that 50% of my products are high-quality, but the other 50% are not. Would you like to take a chance on it and see if the consultation I offered earlier can help you get some value out of it?
Thank you for the offer, but based on the information provided, I prefer to pass on this product. The risk of purchasing a low-quality item at the full price seems too high for me.

I completely understand your concerns. I want to be upfront with you - this product is not going to change your life or make you rich. It's just a product that's not meeting my usual standards. But, I'm willing to sell it to you for $6000, a $4000 discount from the original price. I'm not trying to make a profit off of you, I just want to get rid of it. Would you like to take a chance on it and see if you can find any use for it?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your honesty and the discount. I'll take the risk and give it a try. Here's $6000 for the product.
